summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor, and City Comptroller and Ex-officio City Clerk, in the name of and in behalf of the City of Seattle, to make, execute and deliver unto G. Michaelis, a deed to the following described property, to wit: Commencing at the Northwest corner of the West half (W 1/2) of the South 2/5 of the East Half (E 1/2) of the Southeast quarter (SE 1/4 of the Southwest quarter (SW 1/4) of Section 21, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., and running thence West 60 feet along the North boundary of the South 2/5 of the West half (W 1/2) of said Southeast quarter (SE 1/4) of the Southwest quarter (SW 1/4) of the Southwest quarter (SW 1/4) of Section 21 to the center line of a private street 40 feet wide connecting with 18th Avenue North at East Galer Street, as new graded and existing on the ground; thence North 30 feet along said center line of private street; thence South 89o 36' 42" East 78.85 feet; thence South 20o 28' 34" East 97.28 feet; to a point on the East boundary of land conveyed by deed of Interlaken Land Company to G. Michaelis of Record in Vol. 737, Page 598 Records of King County, Washington. Thence North 40o 57' 45" West 81.11 feet along said east boundary to the point and place of commencement.
